name: Tanks (itch) (MysticDolphin)
description:
a fun local multiplayer game with 6 maps and 2-4 players.  *RECOMMENDED TO PLAY WITH A FULL LENGTH KEYBOARD

Player 1 - TripleShot: WASD to move, Q to shoot. normal size, shoots 3 bullets that get bigger overtime, can bounce off walls 3 times maximum. (Triple Trench Arena)

Player 2 - MegaLaser: V move, CB to turn, N to shoot. 3x the normal size, slightly slower than usual, shoots 100 large bullets at once like a laser. (Scorching Badlands)

Player 3 - SunBurst: UHJK to move, G to shoot, normal size, spawns a sun around him for 1 second. (SunGod Temple)

Player 4 - Dimensio: 4 and 6 to turn, 8 to move forward, 0 to shoot, has a small size boost, bullet spawns at random position, can go through walls (Dream Realm)

Maps - Triple Trench Arena (TripleShot's Arena): 3 long walls in the shape of a triangle in the center. Scorching Badlands (MegaLaser's Arena): no walls just open space. SunGod Temple (SunBurst's Arena): Has 6 short/long walls in the shape of a star. Dream Realm (Dimensio's Arena): has a cube wall with a spiral in the middle. their is a small opening you can sneak through. Corn (Other): has a big corn wall. The Void (Other): Their is 6 square walls that are hidden in the darkness. TIP if you are playing as SunBurst you're suns can light up and show you the walls.
